entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 4.4.12
entry.content:

This release bumps some of our dependencies and also addresses several security issues. Please update at your earliest convenience after taking a backup and ensuring that it's working.

What's Changed

üîíSecurity fixes

CVE-2021-27915 - XSS Cross-site Scripting Stored in Description field - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-2rc5-2755-v422

CVE-2021-27916 - Relative Path Traversal / Arbitrary File Deletion in GrapesJS builder - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-9fcx-cv56-w58p

CVE-2022-25775 - SQL Injection in dynamic Reports - https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-jj6w-2cqg-7p94

entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 5.1.0
entry.content:
Announcing Mautic 5.1.0: Andromeda Edition

A huge thank you to all the contributors who have submitted PRs for features, enhancements and bug fixes and for the amazing folks who have helped to test, code review and provide feedback. Without your help, this release would not be anywhere near as awesome as it is!

From this release going forward, all of our releases will feature a name based on an astrological constellation.

What's Changed

üîß Refactoring

  • Autowire repositories by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13083
  • Refactor Symfony user deprecations. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13129
  • DataTransformer uses proper data. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13130
  • Refactor PHPUnit deprecated methods. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13116
  • Refactor Doctrine deprecations. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13113
  • Introduce iterable_mode instead of deprecated iterator_mode. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13112
  • change allowRestart column as bool by @avikarshasaha in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/11279
  • Replace self::$container with static::getContainer(). by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13290
  • Refactor dashboard to use factory and new cache provider by @galvani in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/7785
  • Change phpstan cache location. by @mallezie in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13302
  • Make ClientController extend AbstractStandardFormController instead of deprecated FormController. by @mallezie in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13296
  • Replace deprecated runCommand with testSymfonyCommand. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13289
  • Improving webhook entity types by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13343
  • Improving types and code coverage by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13348
  • Refactoring and Added test case for segment change event by @dadarya0 in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13445
  • fix: deprecated from (self::MASTER_REQUEST) to (self::MAIN_REQUEST) by @Oluwatos94 in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13712
  • Refactor email clone method by @dadarya0 in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10215
  • [Autoconfiguration] Add integration tags. by @biozshock in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13521
  • Allow replacing Symfony services within tests by @fedys in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13797

‚ú® Features and enhancements

üé® User experience / user interface

The UX/UI Tiger Team have been working on the first phase of our user interface overhaul. Follow their activity, debates and decision making in their Community Portal Assembly and Slack Channel. Get an invite to Slack here.

  • [UI/UX] Self-hosted font by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13317
  • [UX] Add new industries to the Company's Industries field list by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13335
  • [UX] Change ‚ÄúClear cache‚Äù button label and tooltip on Marketplace by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13329
  • [UX] Change marketplace Composer message to be marketer-friendly by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13326
  • [UX] Create a subtitle below signature field (Account page) to remember variables the user can use by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13324
  • [UX] Rename Order to Field order and add a tooltip by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13417
  • [UX] Change category Published label to ‚ÄúAvailable for use‚Äù by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13374
  • [UX] Improve the Custom headers tooltip to explain a use case by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13437
  • [UX] Improve the "Use owner as mailer?" tooltip to tell users where to find the option by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13438
  • [UX] Improve Attachments tooltip to remove redundancy by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13439
  • [UX] Change the title of the close action for greater specificity in the details of an item in the marketplace by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13377
  • [UX] Change ‚ÄúPublicly-visible Segment‚Äù option to ‚ÄúVisible to other users‚Äù since the actual label could lead users to think it‚Äôs visible to people outside of Mautic (leads) by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13371
  • [UX] Change Filters message on New Segment by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13370
  • [UX] Change ‚ÄúRender style from Template?‚Äù to ‚ÄúUse theme style?‚Äù when creating form by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13369
  • [UX] Change right sidebar icon on the navbar by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13365
  • [UX] Change "Import" link on Dashboard dropdown to ‚ÄúImport or select pre-defined dashboard‚Äù by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13364
  • [UX] Tooltip to explain what is ‚ÄúAttribution‚Äù when creating a contact by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13366
  • Report: add date added to contact's data by @kuzmany in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/12841
  • [UI/UX] New icon pack by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13318
  • Support a custom country and region list through a local file by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13430
  • [UX] Change ‚ÄúClear cache‚Äù button icon from Trash to Refresh by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13375
  • [UX] Change Alias tooltips when creating Segments, Assets, Landing pages, Forms, from "Alphanumeric string" to "Letters and numbers" by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13372
  • [UX] Add a tooltip for "Is repeatable" when creating points actions by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13479
  • [UX] Improve the explanation of the Manual Copy way to implement the form by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13478
  • [UX] Change the 3-dot icon to a drag icon by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13475
  • [UX] Change "Visible on short forms" to "Visible on quick add" by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13504
  • [UX] Place the tip modal (the one that asks the website to generate preview) more below for Focus Items by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13494
  • [UX] Improve the explanation of the Automatic way to implement the form by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13477
  • [UX] Separate user account fields in sections by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13473
  • [UX] Change "Published" to "Active" in user settings and add a tooltip by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13503
  • [UX] Specify what is the Default order when creating a webhook by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13501
  • [UX] ‚ÄúScore‚Äù and ‚ÄúCompany owner‚Äù fields on New Company looks inconsistent since both are not part of either ‚ÄúCore‚Äù nor ‚ÄúProfessional‚Äù sections by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13488
  • [UX] Create a tooltip for "Placement" to explain the behavior of the bar (focus item) when it is placed at the bottom of the page by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13493
  • [UX] Add the same user account helper on the user settings page by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13498
  • [UX] Put a placeholder on Alias and Public name when creating Segment to indicate that they‚Äôre auto-generated by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13489
  • [UX] Create tooltips for the "Script inside Head/Footer" labels by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13436
  • [UX] Add a tooltip on "How often to engage?" to explain what means to select "Once per session" by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13491
  • [UX] Make the "Show opened by default" label concise, removing the first word by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13497
  • [UX] Change "System Report?" to "Visible for other users" by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13496
  • [UX] Create a tooltip for "Custom CSS" to make sure the user does not include

entry.title: New release for Mautic: Mautic Community 5.1.1
entry.content:
Mautic 5.1.1: Alpheratz Edition

üîíSecurity release

This release bumps some of our dependencies and also addresses several security issues. Please update at your earliest convenience after taking a backup and ensuring that it's working.

What's Changed

üîí Security fixes

CVE-2022-25768 - Improper access control in UI upgrade process - Reported by @mollux, fixed by @mollux and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-x3jx-5w6m-q2fc.

CVE-2024-47058 - Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - stored (edit form) - reported by @MatisAct, fixed by @LenonLeite and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @avikarshasha in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-xv68-rrmw-9xwf.

CVE-2024-47050 - Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in contact/company tracking - reported by @mqrtin, fixed by @patrykgruszka and tested/reviewed by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-73gr-32wg-qhh7.

CVE-2021-27917 - Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in contact tracking and page hits report - reported by @Patrykgruszka, fixed by @lenonleite and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @lenonleite in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-xpc5-rr39-v8v2.

CVE-2024-47059 - User enumeration through weak password login prompt - reported and fixed by @tomekkowalczyk and tested/reviewed by @escopecz and @patrykgruszka in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-8vff-35qm-qjvv.

CVE-2022-25770 - Removal of upgrade.php file which can have insufficient authentication - reported and fixed by @mollux, tested/reviewed by @kuzmany, @escopecz and @patrykgruzska in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/security/advisories/GHSA-qf6m-6m4g-rmrc.

Twig library update by @escopecz in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/1411

  • Fix generatePageTitle to retrieve the correct page header tag. by @abhisekmazumdar in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13921
  • fix [DPMMA-2661] mapped field form 5.1 by @tomekkowalczyk in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13938
  • fix: attribution tooltip meaning by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13943
  • fix: focus item published by @andersonjeccel in https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/13944
